# Gurdwara Sri Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib, Dhamtan Sahib

| year_completed        =
| groundbreaking        =
| website               =
}}
Gurdwara Sri Guru Tegh Bahadur Sahib is a gurdwara in Jind district of Haryana state in India.
